title: (x) Bat Beats type - (similar to) House Chalet, Skinny {Tim, Dav}
content:
Hello,

Here is a sample which looks similar to Blippo, but is somewhat different. Can anyone help?

comments.content: ' [Skinny](http://web.archive.org/web/20130307130616/http:/www.buyfonts.com/value_for_money/skinny.htm)', _may get you even closer, or may be an alternate, at least_.. :)
Yes, that is even better. Big thanks!
